page.title: 14MARCONI ELECTRONIC DEVICES
page.content: Marconi Electronic Devices moved to Doddington Road in 1981 and currently employs 794 people,but is still expanding and hopes to take on more. The factory at Doddington Road has 2 divisions,Microwave(including Hybrid) and Integrated circuits with a Lincoln design centre capable of semi-custom design for Very Large Scale Integration. The microwave division makes radio frequency amplifiers and switches which are used as part of airfield surveillance and missile defence radar systems. The integrated circuit division deals with silicon chips which are used in telecommunications,T.V.sets and more recently touch screen systems.
